songs.lyrics:
[Guitar Intro]

[Verse 1]
Fly like a bird of prey;
Run like the lighta' day
My blood, my sweat, your tears:
I'm the son of our greatest fears
I'm rising like the sun
To light up everyone

[Pre-Chorus: Variation 1]
Can you hear me shout?
You're gonna feel the sound
I'm gonna turn it up;
Gonna take you down

[Chorus: Variation 1]
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready for me?
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready for me?
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready for me?

Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na

[Verse 2]
Do everything it takes;
Go till my body breaks
My blood, my sweat, your tears:
I'll be running this show for years
I'm burning like the sun
To light up everyone

[Pre-Chorus: Variation 2]
When you hear me shout
You're gonna feel the sound
I'm gonna turn it up;
Gonna take you down

[Chorus: Variation 2]
Are you ready?
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready for me?
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready;
Are you ready for me?
(Ah, ah, ah-ah, ah-ah)
Are you ready;
Are you ready for me?

Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na
Na na na-na-na na-na

[Guitar & Percussion Break]

[Chorus: Variation 2]

[Outro with {Descant}]
{Na na na-na-na na-na}
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready?
{Na na na-na-na na-na}
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready?
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready;
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready for me?
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready;
{Na na na-na-na na-na}   Are you ready for me?

[Instrumental Bridge]

Are you ready for me?

[Instrumental Outro]
songs.title: Are You Ready For Me
